item.title: 刚果计划为 20 世纪 70 年代的麻风腮注射开展皮肤瘢痕培训
item.description: 非洲医护人员正在抗击一种毒性水痘菌株的迅速传播，他们将学习如何有效地搔抓儿童皮肤下层以诱导免疫反应，这种方法几十年来一直未在接种推广中广泛使用。【原文：African health-care workers fighting the rapid spread of a virulent mpox strain will learn how to effectively scratch under layers of children’s skin to induce an immune response, a method not widely used in inoculation rollouts for decades.】

item.title: 交易员认为津巴布韦股市大涨 28% 和 ZiG 走弱将带来麻烦
item.description: 由于投资者寻求避险，以金银为支撑的新货币兑美元汇率创下了历史新低，津巴布韦股市大涨。【原文：Zimbabwe’s stocks are on a tear as investors seek refuge from the new bullion-backed currency that’s at a record low against the US dollar.】

item.title: 美联储和中国需求提振基本金属，本周表现强劲
item.description: 在美联储降息半个百分点的帮助下，铜价飙升至两个月来的新高，为本周金属市场的强劲表现画上了句号。【原文：Copper surged to a two-month high to cap a strong week for metals, helped by the Federal Reserve’s half-point rate cut.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行将在 12 月了解更多情况，但所有选项都是开放的
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，欧洲中央银行将在今年的最后一次会议上更好地了解经济和通胀状况，但仍有可能在下个月采取利率行动。【原文：The European Central Bank will be better informed on the state of the economy and inflation at its final meeting of the year, but could still move on interest rates next month, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 英国赤字超标，债务占 GDP 百分比达 100%，里夫斯遭受重创
item.description: 在本财政年度的前五个月中，英国政府的借贷高于预期，这使得英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）面临着在下个月的预算中提高税收的压力。【原文：UK government borrowing came in higher than forecast in the first five months of the fiscal year, keeping Chancellor Rachel Reeves under pressure to raise taxes in her budget next month.】

item.title: 保险公司艾伦在贝尔菲斯银行支持下估值达 40 亿欧元
item.description: 法国数字医疗保险初创公司 Alan 在比利时银行 Belfius Bank SA 领投的一轮融资中筹集了 1.73 亿欧元（1.93 亿美元），公司估值达 40 亿欧元。【原文：French digital health-insurance startup Alan raised €173 million ($193 million) in a funding round led by Belgian bank Belfius Bank SA that values the company at €4 billion.】

item.title: 欧洲央行雷恩称宽松步伐和范围取决于最新数据
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）在接受芬兰报纸《Kauppalehti》采访时说："欧洲中央银行的货币政策有一个明确的宽松方向，其步伐和范围取决于新的经济数据和分析。【原文：The European Central Bank has “a clearly easing direction for its monetary policy, with the pace and scope dependent on fresh economic data and analysis,” Governing Council Member Olli Rehn told Finnish newspaper Kauppalehti in an interview.】

item.description: 马来西亚正在为家族办公室在其陷入困境的大型项目森林城市（Forest City）开店提供 0% 的税率，以恢复投资者对这一靠近新加坡边境、价值 1,000 亿美元的开发项目的兴趣。【原文：Malaysia is offering 0% tax rate for family offices to set up shop in its struggling mega-project Forest City, as it looks to revive investor interest in the $100 billion development near its border with Singapore.】

item.title: 随着债券反弹，印尼盾将迎来一月以来最好的一周
item.description: 印尼盾将迎来 1 月份以来最好的一周，因为流入的资金不断增加，印尼债券也随之反弹。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah is poised for its best week since January, as the nation’s bonds rally on rising inflows.】

item.description: 中国发布了今年第三批、也可能是最后一批燃料出口配额，配额水平与 2023 年非常接近，这表明中国并不想鼓励炼油企业提高出口活动。【原文：China issued the third and what’s likely to be the final batch of fuel export quota for this year, keeping the level very similar to 2023 in a sign it doesn’t want to encourage refiners to boost activity.】

item.title: 日本央行按兵不动后，日元走强、股市承压成为市场最大呼声
item.description: 策略师表示，日元走强和股市抛售压力是日本央行周五会议可能出现的结果。【原文：A stronger yen and selling pressure in the stock market are among the likely outcomes of the Bank of Japan’s meeting on Friday, strategists say.】

item.title: 世界银行 900 亿美元非洲电气化计划启动
item.description: 在世界银行和非洲开发银行最初承诺的 300 亿美元支持下，一项到 2030 年为 3 亿非洲人供电的计划已开始实施，并对首批潜在受益者进行了评估。【原文：A plan to bring electricity to 300 million Africans by 2030, backed by an initial pledge of $30 billion from the World Bank and the African Development Bank, has begun to be implemented with an assessment of the first potential beneficiaries.】

item.title: 黄金创纪录大涨削弱中国假日购物热情
item.description: 黄金长达数月的破纪录大涨让中国的消费者望而却步，使这个世界最大买家的珠宝零售商本应一年中最繁忙的时期蒙上了阴影。【原文：Gold’s months-long, record-breaking surge is keeping consumers at bay in China, tarnishing what should be one of the busiest times of the year for jewelry retailers in the world’s biggest buyer.】

item.title: 干燥天气影响西澳大利亚小麦收成前景
item.description: 据一份行业报告称，西澳大利亚州春季降雨不足，预计将抑制该州的小麦产量，这可能会加剧全球供应紧张的局面。【原文：A lack of spring rain across Western Australia is expected to crimp wheat production in the nation’s top growing state, according to an industry report, which will likely compound tight global supply.】

item.title: 债务和美元短缺令非洲货币持续承压
item.description: 本季度，新兴市场货币普遍受益于美元走软，而非洲货币却因当地经济面临挑战而逆势上扬。【原文：While emerging market currencies have broadly benefited from a softer US dollar this quarter, African currencies have bucked the trend, weighed down by local economic challenges.】

item.title: 德国经济预计年底才能恢复增长
item.description: 据分析师称，德国经济要到年底才会开始恢复增长，而在此之前，德国经济将险些陷入衰退。【原文：Germany’s economy will only start growing again toward year-end, while narrowly dodging a recession before that, according to analysts.】

item.title: GIC 首席投资官警告美联储减息后通胀风险上升
item.description: 新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）集团首席投资官杰弗里-詹苏巴基（Jeffrey Jaensubhakij）警告说，在通胀上升的风险下，周三大幅降息后的市场繁荣可能是短暂的。【原文：GIC Pte Group Chief Investment Officer Jeffrey Jaensubhakij has warned that the market exuberance following Wednesday’s outsized interest-rate cut could be short-lived amid the risk of rising inflation.】

item.title: 印尼巴里托可再生能源公司在富时指数下调后暴跌
item.description: 在富时罗素（FTSE Russell）表示将在预期入市日期后一天将这家印尼电力巨头从其指数中删除后，PT Barito Renewables Energy 跌破了日涨幅限制。【原文：PT Barito Renewables Energy tumbled by its daily limit after FTSE Russell said it would delete the Indonesian power giant from its indexes a day after the anticipated entry date.】

item.title: 中国考虑取消主要购房限制以刺激需求
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在之前的措施未能重振奄奄一息的房地产市场之后，中国正在考虑取消剩余的一些最大的购房限制。【原文：China is considering removing some of the largest remaining restrictions on home purchases after previous measures failed to revive a moribund housing market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达与人工智能公司 G42 合作创建气候技术实验室
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）正在与阿布扎比的 G42 公司合作创建一个气候技术实验室，这是该公司与阿拉伯联合酋长国顶级人工智能公司的首次合作。【原文：Nvidia Corp. is teaming up with Abu Dhabi-based G42 to create a climate technology lab, marking its first partnership with the United Arab Emirates’ top artificial intelligence firm.】

item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，CTBC 金融控股公司（CTBC Financial Holding Co.【原文：CTBC Financial Holding Co. is set to decide against a fresh offer for Shin Kong Financial Holding Co., according to people familiar with the situation, paving the way for rival Taishin Financial Holding Co. to move ahead with one of the biggest combinations in Taiwan’s financial industry in years.】

item.title: 分析师称斯里兰卡市场损失将因投票而加剧
item.description: 据分析师称，在主要候选人誓言要在选举后重新谈判条款之后，国际货币基金组织的贷款计划面临风险，斯里兰卡的资产似乎将遭受更多损失。【原文：Sri Lankan assets look set for more losses amid risks to the International Monetary Fund’s loan program after key candidates vowed to renegotiate terms after elections, according to analysts.】

item.title: 中国人民银行继续保持关键贷款利率不变
item.description: 中国的银行维持 9 月份的基准贷款利率不变，因为政策制定者暂不采取进一步的货币刺激措施，而金融机构则在创纪录的低利润率中挣扎。【原文：Chinese banks maintained their benchmark lending rates for September, as policymakers hold off on further monetary stimulus while financial institutions struggle with record-low profit margins.】

item.title: 苹果 iPhone 16 上市，却未配备备受期待的人工智能功能
item.description: 苹果公司正面临着前所未有的挑战：说服客户购买没有最大新功能的最新款 iPhone。【原文：Apple Inc. is facing an unprecedented challenge: persuading customers to buy its latest iPhones without their biggest new feature.】
